fields.name: u6pr5gaul4
fields.label: Supplier Naming By
fields.options:
Supplier Name
Naming Series
Auto Name

fields.name: u6pb7rusan
fields.label: Action If Same Rate is Not Maintained
fields.description: Configure the action to stop the transaction or just warn if the same rate is not maintained.

fields.name: u6pljjlnql
fields.label: Role Allowed to Override Stop Action

fields.name: u6p4hbqi13
fields.label: Is Purchase Order Required for Purchase Invoice & Receipt Creation?

fields.name: u6pn9t2ac3
fields.label: Blanket Order Allowance (%)
fields.description: Percentage you are allowed to order beyond the Blanket Order quantity.

fields.name: u6pcd5pltk
fields.label: Is Purchase Receipt Required for Purchase Invoice Creation?

fields.name: u6pprhi5it
fields.label: Update frequency of Project
fields.description: How often should Project be updated of Total Purchase Cost ?

fields.name: u6pgj8jukq
fields.label: Set Landed Cost Based on Purchase Invoice Rate
fields.description: Users can enable the checkbox If they want to adjust the incoming rate (set using purchase receipt) based on the purchase invoice rate.

fields.name: u6pb6ft7ph
fields.label: Allow Supplier Quotation with Zero Quantity
fields.description: Allows users to submit Supplier Quotations with zero quantity. Useful when rates are fixed but the quantities are not. Eg. Rate Contracts.

fields.name: u6pqm12ccs
fields.label: Use Transaction Date Exchange Rate
fields.description: While making Purchase Invoice from Purchase Order, use Exchange Rate on Invoice's transaction date rather than inheriting it from Purchase Order. Only applies for Purchase Invoice.

fields.name: u6ps49sql6
fields.label: Allow Request for Quotation with Zero Quantity
fields.description: Allows users to submit Request for Quotations with zero quantity. Useful when rates are fixed but the quantities are not. Eg. Rate Contracts.

fields.name: u6p2rj6mhn
fields.label: Maintain Same Rate Throughout the Purchase Cycle

fields.name: u6pgmqm0dd
fields.label: Allow Item To Be Added Multiple Times in a Transaction

fields.name: u6p8q739ts
fields.label: Bill for Rejected Quantity in Purchase Invoice
fields.description: If checked, Rejected Quantity will be included while making Purchase Invoice from Purchase Receipt.

fields.name: u6p92i6hq8
fields.label: Set Valuation Rate for Rejected Materials
fields.description: If enabled, the system will generate an accounting entry for materials rejected in the Purchase Receipt.

fields.name: u6pv1dc01k
fields.label: Show Pay Button in Purchase Order Portal

fields.name: u6pmim5qmo
fields.label: Allow Purchase Order with Zero Quantity
fields.description: Allows users to submit Purchase Orders with zero quantity. Useful when rates are fixed but the quantities are not. Eg. Rate Contracts.

fields.name: u6pncruqe6
fields.label: Backflush Raw Materials of Subcontract Based On

fields.name: u6pgvo5ni2
fields.label: Over Transfer Allowance (%)
fields.description: Percentage you are allowed to transfer more against the quantity ordered. For example: If you have ordered 100 units. and your Allowance is 10% then you are allowed to transfer 110 units.

fields.name: u6ptf5337l
fields.label: Auto Create Subcontracting Order
fields.description: Subcontracting Order (Draft) will be auto-created on submission of Purchase Order.

fields.name: u6pl9dj350
fields.label: Auto Create Purchase Receipt
fields.description: Purchase Receipt (Draft) will be auto-created on submission of Subcontracting Receipt.

fields.name: u6ppqe4len
fields.label: Fixed Outgoing Email Account
fields.description: If set, the system does not use the user's Email or the standard outgoing Email account for sending request for quotations.
